post:
StarryDNS is a registered company in Hong Kong (Starry Network Limited) and have been in business since 2013. We offer OpenVZ and KVM VPS in Hong Kong, Japan, and South Korea.

Today I bring 2 KVM VPS offers from Hong Kong and Japan datacenter.

Tokyo, Japan

- CPU: 1

- RAM: 512MB

- HDD: 15GB

- Bandwidth: 500GB@1Gbps

- IPv4: 1

- IPv6 available upon request

- Price: $7 /Mo

- Order: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=490&language=english&currency=2

Hong Kong

- CPU: 1

- RAM: 512MB

- HDD: 15GB

- Bandwidth: 500GB@100Mbps

- IPv4: 1

- IPv6 is not available

- Price: $7 / Month

- Order: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=491&language=english&currency=2

Tokyo, Japan

- Test IPv4: 161.202.125.20

Hong Kong
